name: Rifthoppers
description:
# Controls
WASD to move.
Hold LMB to shoot.
Press RMB to roar.

# Description
Play as Bear as he travels through a Rift in space to help the Professor drain it for power, and fight through hordes of eldritch creatures to keep the Rift from closing.

Collect the Orbs to stabilize the Rift, and Kill Monsters to gain Power. With enough Power collected, the Professor will send you a hand of his many Level-Upgrade cards, which will help you survive longer.
